articles.title: Thousands of Americans without power due to severe weather - BBC.com
articles.description: A storm front has headed north-east after at least 23 people died in tornadoes and high winds across four states.
articles.content:
Holly Honderich,in Washington
Tornadoes and devastating thunderstorms have left nearly 300,000 residents across seven states without power as of Monday night. 
Over the weekend, huge storms killed … [+2884 chars]
